OOC: I'm going to be out of action untill Sunday evening. I'm going up north. I'll try to get online if I can, but probably wont be able to. Now for my chars: Rodimus is just chilling at Maxi base so he is fine. Kup, Darkangel, Wolfenstein and SharpClaws are all at the battle however. Airly could you take Kup and Darkangel and could you take Wolfenstein and SharpClaws Nic? Thanks. Pe@ce!
